title: Marketplace for Wednesday December 3, 2014
teaser: Aired Dec. 3, 2014: The House is voting on whether to bring back certain tax credits that expired at the beginning of the year. It raises the question: Why do they expire in the first place?
byline: Nancy Marshall-Genzer, Stan Alcorn, Noel King, Nova Safo and Kai Ryssdal
description: Aired Dec. 3, 2014: The House is voting on whether to bring back certain tax credits that expired at the beginning of the year. It raises the question: Why do they expire in the first place?
